exchange.question: What's going on here?
exchange.answer: This used to be the bazaar, but we moved to the other side of the town after the 40 thieves kept raiding us.

exchange.question: Sounds like the thieves are pretty bold.
exchange.answer: Tell me about it -- if you set down something valuable on this stone dais, they'll steal it before you can even turn around!

exchange.question: Where do you think the 40 thieves have their hideout?
exchange.answer: They've got to be hiding in the caves. It's the only place that makes sense.

character.statement: It must have been the thieves!
Maybe you can spy on them from somewhere else.
That looks like a nice thing to lose.
Maybe you didn't hear about the 40 reasons not to place that there?
Look's like something can be placed here.
Doesn't look like he wants to move.
